scripts.kill-port: lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'Port 8000 is free'
scripts.check-ports: echo 'Checking common ports...' && (lsof -i:3000 && echo 'Port 3000 in use') || echo 'Port 3000 available' && (lsof -i:8000 && echo 'Port 8000 in use') || echo 'Port 8000 available' && (lsof -i:8080 && echo 'Port 8080 in use') || echo 'Port 8080 available'
